title: 472 - Learning from 1 Million COVID Deaths and Preparing for “The Contagion Next Time”
itunes:title: 472 - Learning from 1 Million COVID Deaths and Preparing for “The Contagion Next Time”
description: Dr. Sandro Galea, dean of the Boston University School of Public Health and author of the book “The Contagion Next Time” talks with Dr. Josh Sharfstein about why the US was a “sitting duck” at the onset of the pandemic. They also discuss what needs to change in public health—and society—to be better prepared for day-to-day challenges and the next emergency.
